details.description: Data and image compressing, COVID-19 prediction, movie genre classifier, diffusion map algorithm on large biomedical datasets, US wildfire clustering and time series analysis, graph signal processing and spectral clustering, word embeddings
Packages: Numpy, Pandas, Scikit-learn, TensorFlow, PyTorch, SciPy, Keras, Matplotlib, seaborn
Constructed a CFD model of a ship's propeller jet with C++, investigating the pressure and velocity field on canal bottoms
Pioneered a number of advanced optimization techniques, leading to a more economical canal design
